Name: trim
Description: Remove whitespace from both sides of a string.

Name: ltrim
Description: Remove whitespace from the left side of a string.

Name: rtrim
Description: Remove whitespace from the right side of a string.

Name: reverse
Description: Reverse the characters of a string.

Name: mid
Description: Return a portion of a string, starting at position, for the specific number of characters.

Name: ucase
Description: Change all characters in a string to upper-case.

Name: lcase
Description: Change all characters in a string to lower-case.

Name: rcase
Description: Change all characters in a string to a random case.

Name: ucwords
Description: Change the first character in each word of a string to upper-case.

Name: lcwords
Description: Change the first character in each word of a string to lower-case.

Name: random
Description: Return a random integer within the specified range.

Name: random_decimal
Description: Return a random number within the specified range, with a specified number of decimal places.

Name: random_color
Description: Return a random R-G-B color.

Name: random_color_range
Description: Return a random R-G-B color within the specified range of random RGB values.

Name: window
Description: Create or update a window.

Name: text
Description: Create or update a text area.

Name: button
Description: Create or update a button.

Name: font
Description: Create or update a font definition. Fonts can be applied to objects like text and buttons

Name: color
Description: Create or update a foreground color, with an optional background color. Colors can be applied to other objects.

Name: border
Description: Create a border. Borders can be applied to some other objects.
